scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Visitation, with the Virgin Mary, identifiable by her halo, embracing Elizabeth, who is also haloed and appears to be pregnant. To the left, a figure in a dark robe, possibly Saint Joseph or a religious figure, stands observing. The background features stylized trees and a distant architectural structure resembling a castle or fortified town with towers and crenellations. The figures are positioned on a decorative, swirling ground pattern.
